page.title: 12LIVING IN CLEATOR MOOR
page.content: You could not live your full life in Cleator Moor without having to go out. You would have to go to Whitehaven or Workington for some of your main shopping. You can buy a toilet in Cleator Moor but not an armchair or a sofa. You would have to go out to see the countryside because you could not stay somewhere without seeing hills or mountains or go hillwalking. There are a few shops in Cleator Moor. There are clothes shops,food shops,a chemist,two bakeries, 2 post offices and two fish shops. There also are five schools in Cleator Moor. They are Montreal and Ehenside.St.Patricks Infant School and Junior School and the Nursery School. Secondary Education is only available up to age 16 at the moment, in Ehenside School, A-level candidates having to transfer to Whitehaven, but soon Ehenside will be running its own
